item.title: Termux
item.description:
<p>参考<a href="https://www.sqlsec.com/2018/05/termux.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Termux 高级终端安装使用配置教程</a>整理</p>
<h2 id="termux简介" class="heading-element"><span>termux简介</span>
 <a href="#termux%e7%ae%80%e4%bb%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>Termux是一个Android终端仿真器和Linux环境应用程序，直接工作，无需根目录或设置。一个最小的基本系统被自动安装-额外的软件包可以使用APT软件包管理器来使用。不需要root，运行于内部存储。</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://termux.com/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">termux官网</a></li>
<li><a href="https://wiki.termux.com/wiki/Main_Page"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">termux wiki</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/termux/termux-app"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">github地址</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="termux-安装" class="heading-element"><span>termux 安装</span>
 <a href="#termux-%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>
<p>下载安装包并安装</p>
<p>Googleplay 上的版本已不再更新(见<a href="https://wiki.termux.com/wiki/Termux_Google_Play"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">说明</a>),官方推荐到 <strong>f-droid</strong> <a href="https://f-droid.org/packages/com.termux/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">下载</a></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>第一次启动Termux的时候需要从<a href="http://termux.net/bootstrap/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">服务器</a>加载数据,如出现提示:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Ubable to install Termux was unable to install the bootstrap packages.Check your ntwork connection and try again.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>需要科学上网。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="termux-基本操作" class="heading-element"><span>termux 基本操作</span>
 <a href="#termux-%e5%9f%ba%e6%9c%ac%e6%93%8d%e4%bd%9c" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>
<p>调整屏幕字体大小，双指捏合或展开</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>长按屏幕，会出现菜单项，</p>
<ul>
<li>copy</li>
<li>paste</li>
<li>more
<ul>
<li>Select URL # 提取屏幕上的链接</li>
<li>Share transcipt # 分享命令</li>
<li>Reset # 重置</li>
<li>Kill process # 结束当前进程</li>
<li>Style # 风格配色</li>
<li>Keep screen on # 屏幕常亮</li>
<li>help # 帮助</li>
<li>setting # 设置</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>屏幕左上角从左向右滑动，调出菜单，可以新建、切换会话。长按 keyboard 可以打开/关闭输入法工具条（扩展按键）</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>常用快捷键</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>termux 中手机<strong>音量减</strong>键相当于<strong>Ctrl</strong>键，快捷键组合如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ctrl + A -&gt; 将光标移动到行首
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ctrl + C -&gt; 中止当前进程
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ctrl + D -&gt; 注销终端会话			
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ctrl + E -&gt; 将光标移动到行尾
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ctrl + K -&gt; 从光标删除到行尾
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ctrl + U -&gt; 从光标删除到行首
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ctrl + L -&gt; 清除终端
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ctrl + Z -&gt; 挂起（发送SIGTSTP到）当前进程
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ctrl + alt + C -&gt; 打开新会话</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></li>
<li>
<p><strong>音量加</strong>键的组合</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + E -&gt; Esc键
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + T -&gt; Tab键
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + 1 -&gt; F1（音量增加 + 2 → F2…以此类推）
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + 0 -&gt; F10
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + B -&gt; Alt + B，使用readline时返回一个单词
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + F -&gt; Alt + F，使用readline时转发一个单词
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + X -&gt; Alt+X
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + W -&gt; 向上箭头键
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + A -&gt; 向左箭头键
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + S -&gt; 向下箭头键
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + D -&gt; 向右箭头键
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + L -&gt; | （管道字符）
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + H -&gt; 〜（波浪号字符）
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + U -&gt; _ (下划线字符)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + P -&gt; 上一页
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + N -&gt; 下一页
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + . -&gt; Ctrl + \（SIGQUIT）
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + V -&gt; 显示音量控制
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + Q -&gt; 切换显示的功能键视
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">音量加 + K -&gt; 切换显示的功能键视图</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="termux-包管理" class="heading-element"><span>termux 包管理</span>
 <a href="#termux-%e5%8c%85%e7%ae%a1%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>termux 支持<code>pkg</code>和<code>apt</code>，<code>pkg</code>兼容<code>apt</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg search &lt;query&gt; # 搜索包
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg install &lt;package&gt; # 安装包
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg uninstall &lt;package&gt; # 卸载包
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg reinstall &lt;package&gt; # 重新安装包
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg update # 更新源
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg upgrade # 升级软件包
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg list-all # 列出可供安装所有包
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg list-installed # 列出已经安装的包
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg show &lt;package&gt; # 显示某个包的详细信息
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg files &lt;package&gt; # 显示某个包的相关文件夹路径	</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>安装几个基础应用</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg update
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg install vim curl wget git tree -y</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>pkg</code> 命令每次安装的时候自动执行 <code>apt update</code> 命令，建议使用。如有 deb 包，还可以使用<code>dpkg</code>安装</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-go" data-lang="go"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nx">dpkg</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="nx">i</span> <span class="p">.</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="kn">package</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">deb</span> <span class="err">#</span> <span class="nx">安装</span> <span class="nx">deb</span> <span class="nx">包</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nx">dpkg</span> <span class="o">--</span><span class="nx">remove</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="kn">package</span> <span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="err">#</span> <span class="nx">卸载软件包</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nx">dpkg</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="nx">l</span> <span class="err">#</span> <span class="nx">查看已安装的包</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nx">man</span> <span class="nx">dpkg</span> <span class="err">#</span> <span class="nx">查看详细文档</span>	
</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="termux-文件目录" class="heading-element"><span>termux 文件目录</span>
 <a href="#termux-%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e7%9b%ae%e5%bd%95" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">echo $HOME
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/data/data/com.termux/files/home
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">echo $PREFIX
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/data/data/com.termux/files/usr
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">echo $TMPDIR
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/tmp/		</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>export</code>命令显示更多信息</p>
<h2 id="termux-优化设置" class="heading-element"><span>termux 优化设置</span>
 <a href="#termux-%e4%bc%98%e5%8c%96%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>
<p>更换国内源</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>用 <code>termux-change-repo</code> 命令替换</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>输入以下命令替换</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sed -i &#39;s@^\(deb.*stable main\)$@#\1\ndeb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/termux/termux-packages-24 stable main@&#39; $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sed -i &#39;s@^\(deb.*games stable\)$@#\1\ndeb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/termux/game-packages-24 games stable@&#39; $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list.d/game.list
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sed -i &#39;s@^\(deb.*science stable\)$@#\1\ndeb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/termux/science-packages-24 science stable@&#39; $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list.d/science.list
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt update &amp;&amp; apt upgrade</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>见<a href="https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/termux/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">清华大学开源软件镜像站</a></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>安装oh-my-zsh</p>
<p>使用 zsh 替代 bash ，并安装 oh-my-zsh 。项目地址: <a href="https://github.com/Cabbagec/termux-ohmyzsh/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://github.com/Cabbagec/termux-ohmyzsh/</a></p>
<p>使用脚本</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sh -c &#34;$(curl -fsSL https://github.com/Cabbagec/termux-ohmyzsh/raw/master/install.sh)&#34;</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>弹框确认，允许访问文件。不小心拒绝，使用<code>termux-setup-storage</code> 命令可以重新获取访问权限。</p>
<p>脚本执行后提示设置色彩样式和字体样式</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Enter a number, leave blank to not to change: 14 Enter a number, leave blank to not to change: 4</p>
</blockquote>
<p>可以用<code>chcolor</code>和<code>chfont</code>命令再次修改色彩和字体</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>定制扩展按键</p>
<p>通过 <code>~/.termux/termux.properties</code> 定制扩展按键，加入以下内容:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">extra-keys=[[&#39;ESC&#39;,&#39;|&#39;,&#39;/&#39;,&#39;-&#39;,&#39;HOME&#39;,&#39;UP&#39;,&#39;END&#39;,&#39;PGUP&#39;],[&#39;TAB&#39;,&#39;CTRL&#39;,&#39;ALT&#39;,&#39;DEL&#39;,&#39;LEFT&#39;,&#39;DOWN&#39;,&#39;RIGHT&#39;,&#39;PGDN&#39;]]</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>按键定义</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">|CTRL|CTRL键|ALT|ALT键|FN|功能键|
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">|ESC|退出键|TAB|表格键|HOME|原位键|
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">|END|结尾键|PGUP|上翻页键|PGDN|下翻页键|
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">|INS|插入键|DEL|删除键|BKSP|退格键|
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">|UP |方向键上|LEFT|方向键左|RIGHT|方向键右|
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">|DOWN|方向键下|ENTER|回车键|BACKSLASH|反斜杠\|
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">|QUOTE|双引号键|APOSTROPHE|单引号键|F1~F12|F1-F12按键|</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>重启 termux 生效</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>安装autosuggestions插件</p>
<p>自动提示接下来可能要输入的命令，提高效率。下载:</p>
<p><code>git clone git://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions $ZSH_CUSTOM/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions</code></p>
<p>修改配置 <code>~/.zshrc</code> 中的选项</p>
<p><code>plugins=(git zsh-autosuggestions)</code></p>
<p>输入<code>zsh</code>使配置生效</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>修改启动问候语</p>
<p><code>vim $PREFIX/etc/motd</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>vim 设置优化
在 <code>~/.vimrc</code> 文件中修改</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">&#34;解决中文乱码
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">set fileencodings=utf-8,gb2312,gb18030,gbk,ucs-bom,cp936,latin1
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">set enc=utf8
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">set fencs=utf8,gbk,gb2312,gb18030
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">&#34;显示行号
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">set nu
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">&#34;颜色主题
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">colorscheme desert
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">&#34;打开语法高亮
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">syntax on</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="termux-常用软件" class="heading-element"><span>termux 常用软件</span>
 <a href="#termux-%e5%b8%b8%e7%94%a8%e8%bd%af%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>
<p>Openssh <code>pkg install openssh</code></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>连接其它服务器</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh -p 22 user@hostname_or_ip # ssh -p 端口号 用户名@主机名或者IP
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh -i id_rsa user@hostname_or_ip # ssh -i 私钥 用户名@主机名或者IP</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></li>
<li>
<p>开启 termux 的 sshd 服务</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sshd #开启服务
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkill sshd #关闭服务</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>Termux 下的 SSH 默认端口为8022，配置文件位于 <code>$PREFIX/etc/ssh/sshd_config</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">PrintMotd yes
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">PasswordAuthentication yes
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Subsystem sftp /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/libexec/sftp-server</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>用<code>paswd</code>命令修改用户密码后就可以使用密码登录SSH</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>通过密钥对连接</p>
<p>生成密钥对</p>
<p><code>ssh-keygen</code></p>
<p>在 ~/.ssh 目录下生成 3 个文件 <code>id_rsa</code>(私钥)、<code>id_rsa.pub</code>(公钥)、<code>known_hosts</code>，将公钥内容复制到 <code>.ssh/</code> 目录下的 <code>authorized_keys </code>中</p>
<p><code>cat id_rsa.pub &gt; authorized_keys</code></p>
<p>修改ssh配置</p>
<p><code>vim $PREFIX/etc/ssh/sshd_config</code></p>
<p><code>PasswordAuthentication no</code></p>
<p>重启ssh</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkill sshd
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sshd</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>娱乐一下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">cmatrix # 《黑客帝国》的代码雨视觉特效
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cowsay # 用 ASCII 字符描绘牛，羊和许多其他动物
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">figlet # 创建 ASCII logo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hollywood # 终端中伪造黑客屏幕，假装是黑客
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">nyancat # 彩虹猫
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sl # ls输错，火车来了
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">toilet # 用字母拼写出更大字母的工具
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">screenfetch/neofetch # 显示系统信息
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">`echo &#34;xxxxx&#34; |curl -F-=\&lt;- qrenco.de` # 生成二维码</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="termux-其它应用" class="heading-element"><span>termux 其它应用</span>
 <a href="#termux-%e5%85%b6%e5%ae%83%e5%ba%94%e7%94%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>
<p>搭建 hexo</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg install nodejs-lts
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">npm install hexo-cli -g
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hexo init myblog_hexo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cd myblog_hexo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">npm install hexo-theme-fluid
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cp node_modules/hexo-theme-fluid/_config.yml _config.fluid.yml
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hexo g
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hexo s					</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>默认访问地址 http://localhost:4000</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>搭建hugo</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg install hugo -y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new site myblog_hugo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cd myblog_hugo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cp themes/even/exampleSite/config.toml ./
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo server -D</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>默认访问地址 http://localhost:1313</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>安装 linux 发行版
使用官方工具<a href="https://github.com/termux/proot-distro"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">proot-distro</a>安装 linux</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pkg install proot-distro</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></li>
</ul>

item.title: markdown
item.description:
<p><strong>Markdown</strong>基本格式</p>
<h2 id="标题" class="heading-element"><span><strong>标题</strong></span>
 <a href="#%e6%a0%87%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl"># 一级标题
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">## 二级标题
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">### 三级标题</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="一级标题" class="heading-element"><span>一级标题</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%80%e7%ba%a7%e6%a0%87%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h2 id="二级标题" class="heading-element"><span>二级标题</span>
 <a href="#%e4%ba%8c%e7%ba%a7%e6%a0%87%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="三级标题" class="heading-element"><span>三级标题</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%89%e7%ba%a7%e6%a0%87%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
